events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number shows no updates.
Based on the customer's message mentioning delay and tracking issues, the case is categorized under Delivery Delay.
The case has been assigned to delivery support team member for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand your order is delayed and I’m here to help resolve this for you.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details so I can check the current status for you?
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and the tracking number is TRACK987654321. No updates for the last week.
Thank you for the details. I’ve contacted the courier and they’ve confirmed an unexpected delay. We expect delivery within 3 business days.
Thanks for checking that for me. I appreciate the update and hope the package arrives soon.
We will monitor your order and keep you informed. Please reach out if you don’t receive it by then. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm if your order has arrived as expected and if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday. Everything is in good condition. Thanks for the follow-up!
We’re glad to hear you received your order successfully. Closing the case now, and please contact us anytime for future needs.
